name: Shadow city：Paradise plan
description:
The disaster in the city of X was very much involved. Hidden in the dark, mysterious groups in order to protect "antiquities" for the purpose of the action
You act as a liaison, deep inside hostile organizations, trying to save the present situation
In the sudden disaster, you should use careful thinking to rescue themselves
In planning the raid deliberately, you must do everything possible to survive.
Can you get out of this hell?
-------------------------------
The most burning brain game comes back
The puzzle and organization of difficulty upgrading
Intricate plots and events
To survive, the full use of your wisdom!
